type.description:
## Daytime

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/daytime)

Checks whether it is daytime in the world.

Type ID: `origins:daytime`

---

### Examples
```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:daytime"
}
```
